constituent: bamboo hat, bamboo, vase, stand up
koohiiStory1: The bamboo vase was beautifully crafted, but the tourist didn´t know what it was and wore it as a little bamboo hat.
koohiiStory2: The bamboo part is easy. Just remember that this kanji refers to those particular bamboo hats that are worn primarily by Buddhist monks, who always seem to stand outside of train stations, collecting alms.
myStory: chữ Lạp. cái nón, mũ tre. tre đứng đội nón
